decision_conditions: <p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 11pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">The proposal, for reasons of its height, size, scale and siting, on an area of pavement situated at a busy junction in close proximity residential units, will be a visually discordant and obtrusive feature in the street scene that will harm the character and appearance of the area.&nbsp;
